name: Honey, Where's My Parachute?
description:
A game created in 7 days, as our own little challenge. Inspired by a glitch in the original Quake where the devs forgot to program in a parachute that was necessary to complete a level... !!! This is also officially our first game together :)

--

What do you do when the devs fail you? You make your own way! "Honey, Where's My Parachute?" is a game in which you must scavenge materials to make a parachute because the devs (us) have failed to provide you with one.

--

If you really liked this game and/or want to see more, consider supporting us on Patreon! It would make our week :)
